about_the_game:
Welcome to Ninety-Nine (99), where your sharpest instincts and quickest reflexes will be put to the ultimate test! Immerse yourself in a vibrant tropical paradise, but don’t let the scenery fool you—this island is teeming with mischievous monkeys ready to challenge you in a fruit-fueled frenzy.

**Gameplay Overview:**

Armed with dual pistols, you’ll face off against waves of crafty monkeys as they hurl a barrage of fruits and even the occasional bomb your way. Your mission? Blast them out of the sky before they reach you. But there’s a twist: you only have 99 bullets. Make every shot count as you navigate through increasingly challenging levels, each more chaotic than the last.

**Key Features:**

**Unique Bullet Management:** With just 99 bullets, strategic shooting is key. Precision and timing will be your greatest assets as you take down your targets.

**Dynamic Environment:** Enjoy the beauty of a lush, tropical island, but stay alert—the environment is as unpredictable as your opponents.
Mischievous Monkey Enemies: These clever primates are more than just fruit-throwers; they’ll keep you on your toes with unexpected moves and surprise tactics.

**Fast-Paced Action:** Experience intense, rapid-fire gameplay that keeps you engaged and entertained, perfect for VR enthusiasts who love a challenge.
Immersive VR Experience: Feel the rush of the shootout with immersive VR controls that put you right in the action.

name: Ninety-NIne (99)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i3-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 3

short_description: Step into the chaos of Ninety-Nine (99), a fast-paced VR shooter! Armed with dual pistols, survive a tropical barrage as mischievous monkeys throw fruits and bombs your way. With just 99 bullets, quick reflexes and sharp aim are your only hope. How far can you go in this action-packed adventure?
